video.title: Hostages
video.synopsis: A rogue FBI agent takes the family of an elite surgeon hostage -- and orders her to kill the president of the United States when she operates on him.

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ellen Sanders, a top surgeon in Washington, D.C., has been tapped to operate on the president of the United States ... and then kill him.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When Ellen disobeys Duncan's orders to assassinate the president during his surgery, he tells her it will cost her a family member's life.
episodes.title: Invisible Leash

episodes.synopsis: Duncan tells Ellen to convince the president to keep her on as his surgeon after he decides to go with another doctor, or there will be consequences.
episodes.title: Power of Persuasion

episodes.synopsis: Ellen and Brian devise a plan with their kids to escape from Duncan. Meanwhile, Duncan's wife, Nina, tells him she wants to discontinue her treatment.
episodes.title: 2:45 PM

episodes.synopsis: Ellen must perform emergency surgery in her own home. Archer tells Duncan that an innocent person in their plan has become a victim.
episodes.title: Truth and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: When Ellen's sister shows up unexpectedly, Duncan forces Ellen to get rid of her. Meanwhile, the Secret Service calls Ellen in for questioning again.
episodes.title: Sister's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Ellen and Brian agree to take down Duncan in order to escape. Archer's accomplice plans to reveal info about a murder Archer committed.
episodes.title: Hail Mary

episodes.synopsis: Ellen decides whether to save Duncan's life. The president informs Creasy and Vanessa that he wants to expose details of Operation Total Information.
episodes.title: The Good Reason

episodes.synopsis: When investigators close in on the conspiracy to kill the president, Duncan must get rid of an insider. Duncan gives Ellen the poison for the murder.
episodes.title: Loose Ends

episodes.synopsis: A presidential staffer is murdered, and Ellen urges Duncan to back out of the assassination plot. Ellen finds a possible bone marrow donor for Nina.
episodes.title: Burden of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Duncan locks the Sanders family in a room for the day while he and his team head to New York to eliminate the sniper team targeting President Kincaid.
episodes.title: Off the Record

episodes.synopsis: Brian intends to expose Duncan and his team to the police but decides against it after Burton shows him evidence of Ellen and Duncan getting close.
episodes.title: The Cost of Living

episodes.synopsis: Ellen reveals to Duncan that she will not kill the president but will help him get what he needs. Nina learns of Duncan's plan and flees the hospital.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Duncan discovers Sandrine's betrayal and decides to use her to save Nina and Sawyer. The first lady confronts Ellen about the assassination plot.
episodes.title: Suspicious Minds

episodes.synopsis: Duncan discovers Sandrine's betrayal and decides to use her to save Nina and Sawyer. The first lady confronts Ellen about the assassination plot.
episodes.title: Endgame
